remarks: The evaluation of the variable of univariate polynomials over subring yields the same result as evaluated as variable of the polynomials over the ring itself.  (Contributed by AV, 12-Sep-2019.)
statement:
evls1varsrng.q $e |- Q = ( S evalSub1 R ) $.
evls1varsrng.o $e |- O = ( eval1 ` S ) $.
evls1varsrng.v $e |- V = ( var1 ` U ) $.
evls1varsrng.u $e |- U = ( S |`s R ) $.
evls1varsrng.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
evls1varsrng.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. CRing ) $.
evls1varsrng.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) $.
evls1varsrng $p |- ( ph -> ( Q ` V ) = ( O ` V ) ) $.
